summary.span: Windows フォーム コントロールと WPF コントロールの相互運用をサポートするクラスが含まれています。

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名前空間には、間の相互運用を可能にするクラスが含まれています、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]と[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]テクノロジです。The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. 使用するとホストできますが、クラス[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]のコントロールに[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]ページ、および[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]内の要素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-ベースのアプリケーションです。When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. 相互運用機能を実装する 2 つのキー クラスとです。The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . 使用するクラスは、コントロールの実装に依存します。Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - 使用して、クラス使用する必要があります、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]の control 権限、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]ページ。Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - 使用して、クラス使用する必要があります、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]内の要素、 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-ベースのアプリケーションです。Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
